meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>lie</kanji> about your <kanji>title</kanji>, the title which represents who you are, then that is a <vocabulary>misrepresentation</vocabulary>. A <vocabulary>false statement</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
